22 #include "mutation++.h"
23 #include <catch.hpp>

25 using namespace Mutation;
26 using namespace Mutation::Kinetics;
27 using namespace Mutation::Utilities::IO;
28 using namespace Catch;

30 
31 const Mutation::Thermodynamics::Thermodynamics& thermo()
32 {
33  // Setup a shared thermo object for testing reaction types
34  static Mutation::Thermodynamics::Thermodynamics thermo(
35  "e- N N+ Ar(1) Ar(2) Ar+(0) O O- O+ NO NO+ N2 N2+ O2 O2+ He+ He++",
36  "RRHO", "ChemNonEq1T"
37  );
38 
39  return thermo;
40 }
41 
44 Reaction createReaction(const std::string& formula)
45 {
46  XmlElement node(
47  "<reaction formula=\"" + formula + "\" >"
48  " <arrhenius A=\"5.0E15\" n=\"+0.0\" T=\"75500.0\" />"
49  "</reaction>"
50  );
51 
52  return { node, thermo() };
53 }
54 
55 void checkReactionType(const std::string& formula, ReactionType type)
56 {
57  const auto reaction = createReaction(formula);
58 
59  INFO("Reaction: " << formula)
60  INFO("Should be type: " << reactionTypeString(type))
61  INFO("Actual type is: " << reactionTypeString(reaction.type()))
62 
63  CHECK(reaction.type() == type);
64 }
65 
66 void checkReactionType(
67  const std::string& reactants,
68  const std::string& products,
69  ReactionType forward_type,
70  ReactionType reverse_type)
71 {
72  checkReactionType(reactants + " = " + products, forward_type);
73  checkReactionType(products + " = " + reactants, reverse_type);
74 }
75 
79 TEST_CASE("Reaction types are correctly identified", "[kinetics]")
80 {
81  // ASSOCIATIVE_IONIZATION and DISSOCIATIVE_RECOMBINATION
82  checkReactionType("N + O", "NO+ + e-", ASSOCIATIVE_IONIZATION, DISSOCIATIVE_RECOMBINATION);
83  checkReactionType("N + N", "N2+ + e-", ASSOCIATIVE_IONIZATION, DISSOCIATIVE_RECOMBINATION);
84 
85  // ASSOCIATIVE_DETACHMENT and DISSOCIATIVE_ATTACHMENT
86  checkReactionType("O- + O", "O2 + e-", ASSOCIATIVE_DETACHMENT, DISSOCIATIVE_ATTACHMENT);
87 
88  // DISSOCIATION_E and RECOMBINATION_E
89  checkReactionType("NO + e-", "N + O + e-", DISSOCIATION_E, RECOMBINATION_E);
90  checkReactionType("N2 + e-", "2N + e-", DISSOCIATION_E, RECOMBINATION_E);
91  checkReactionType("NO+ + e-", "N+ + O + e-", DISSOCIATION_E, RECOMBINATION_E);
92 
93  // DISSOCIATION_M and RECOMBINATION_M
94  checkReactionType("NO + M", "N + O + M", DISSOCIATION_M, RECOMBINATION_M);
95  checkReactionType("N2 + M", "2N + M", DISSOCIATION_M, RECOMBINATION_M);
96  checkReactionType("NO + N", "2N + O", DISSOCIATION_M, RECOMBINATION_M);
97  checkReactionType("N2 + N", "3N", DISSOCIATION_M, RECOMBINATION_M);
98  checkReactionType("N2 + N2", "4N", DISSOCIATION_M, RECOMBINATION_M);
99  checkReactionType("N2+ + M", "N+ + N + M", DISSOCIATION_M, RECOMBINATION_M);
100  checkReactionType("NO + O+", "N + O + O+", DISSOCIATION_M, RECOMBINATION_M);
101 
102  // ELECTRONIC_DETACHMENT_E and ELECTRONIC_ATTACHMENT_E
103  checkReactionType("O + 2e-", "O- + e-", ELECTRONIC_ATTACHMENT_E, ELECTRONIC_DETACHMENT_E);
104 
105  // ELECTRONIC_DETACHMENT_M and ELECTRONIC_ATTACHMENT_M
106  checkReactionType("O + e- + N", "O- + N", ELECTRONIC_ATTACHMENT_M, ELECTRONIC_DETACHMENT_M);
107  checkReactionType("O + e- + M", "O- + M", ELECTRONIC_ATTACHMENT_M, ELECTRONIC_DETACHMENT_M);
108 
109  // EXCHANGE
110  checkReactionType("N2 + O2 = 2NO", EXCHANGE);
111  checkReactionType("NO + O = O2 + N", EXCHANGE);
112  checkReactionType("N+ + O = N + O+", EXCHANGE);
113  checkReactionType("O+ + O- = 2O", EXCHANGE);
114  checkReactionType("NO+ + NO = N2 + O2+", EXCHANGE);
115  checkReactionType("N2+ + O = NO + N+", EXCHANGE);
116  checkReactionType("N2 + O+ = NO + N+", EXCHANGE);
117 
118  // IONIZATION_E and ION_RECOMBINATION_E
119  checkReactionType("N + e-", "N+ + 2e-", IONIZATION_E, ION_RECOMBINATION_E);
120  checkReactionType("NO + e-", "NO+ + 2e-", IONIZATION_E, ION_RECOMBINATION_E);
121  checkReactionType("He+ + e-", "He++ + 2e-", IONIZATION_E, ION_RECOMBINATION_E);
122  checkReactionType("Ar(1) + e-", "Ar+(0) + 2e-", IONIZATION_E, ION_RECOMBINATION_E);
123 
124  // IONIZATION_M and ION_RECOMBINATION_M
125  checkReactionType("N + M", "N+ + M + e-", IONIZATION_M, ION_RECOMBINATION_M);
126  checkReactionType("N + N", "N+ + N + e-", IONIZATION_M, ION_RECOMBINATION_M);
127  checkReactionType("He+ + M", "He++ + M + e-", IONIZATION_M, ION_RECOMBINATION_M);
128  checkReactionType("NO + N2", "NO+ + N2 + e-", IONIZATION_M, ION_RECOMBINATION_M);
129  checkReactionType("Ar(1) + Ar(1)", "Ar+(0) + Ar(1) + e-", IONIZATION_M, ION_RECOMBINATION_M);
130 
131  // EXCITATION_E
132  checkReactionType("Ar(1) + e-", "Ar(2) + e-", EXCITATION_E, EXCITATION_E);
133 
134  // EXCITATION_M
135  checkReactionType("Ar(1) + M", "Ar(2) + M", EXCITATION_M, EXCITATION_M);
136 }
137 
138 
139 TEST_CASE("Reaction stoichiometry is correctly identified", "[kinetics]")
140 {
141  auto reaction = createReaction("N2 + M = 2N + M");
142 
143  CHECK( reaction.reactant(thermo().speciesIndex("N2")) == 1 );
144  CHECK( reaction.reactant(thermo().speciesIndex("N")) == 0 );
145 
146  CHECK( reaction.product(thermo().speciesIndex("N2")) == 0 );
147  CHECK( reaction.product(thermo().speciesIndex("N")) == 2 );
148 
149  reaction = createReaction("N2 + O = NO + N");
150 
151  CHECK( reaction.reactant(thermo().speciesIndex("N2")) == 1 );
152  CHECK( reaction.reactant(thermo().speciesIndex("O")) == 1 );
153  CHECK( reaction.reactant(thermo().speciesIndex("NO")) == 0 );
154  CHECK( reaction.reactant(thermo().speciesIndex("N")) == 0 );
155 
156  CHECK( reaction.product(thermo().speciesIndex("N2")) == 0 );
157  CHECK( reaction.product(thermo().speciesIndex("O")) == 0 );
158  CHECK( reaction.product(thermo().speciesIndex("NO")) == 1 );
159  CHECK( reaction.product(thermo().speciesIndex("N")) == 1 );
160 }
